document_data.name: Madwave
document_data.mainbody: Captain '''Madwave''' was the [[human]] captain and owner of the [[Gontal|Gontese]] merchant ship ''[[Argus Treader]]''.{{Cite dragon/366/Gontal|52}}
document_data.Background: Captain Madwave was one of the few gontese ship owners who didn't worked for the [[Twelvefold]]. She had the reputation of never having lost a cargo, a member of her crew, or a bet.
